metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19061 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
A memory leak in the adis_update_scan_mode_burst() function indrivers/iio/imu/adis_buffer.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.9 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption), akaCID-9c0530e898f3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19061` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-lowlatency - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-207.239
linux-image-extra-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.4.0-207.239
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-118-generic - 4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-118-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-118-lowlatency - 4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-118-generic - 4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-118-lowlatency - 4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1091-kvm - 4.4.0-1091.100
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1126-aws - 4.4.0-1126.140
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1083-aws - 4.15.0-1083.87~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1096-azure - 4.15.0-1096.106~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1084-gcp - 4.15.0-1084.95~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1054-oracle - 4.15.0-1054.58~16.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-207.239').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-118.119~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1091.100').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1126.140').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1083.87~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1096.106~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1084.95~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1054.58~16.04.1').
linux-raspi2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1150.161').
linux-snapdragon package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1154.164').
